website_summaries.verdict: With 3 large games packed with Marvel heroes and villains like the Hulk, Lizard, Songbird, and Taskmaster, this LEGO game bundle is guaranteed to entertain for ages.
pros: Includes LEGO Marvel Superheroes, LMS 2, and LEGO Avengers games
Available on Xbox One, and PS4
cons: You must swap between 2 discs to play all games

customer_reviews.title: Don't judge.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 2 days ago and absolutely love it! Fast shipping and works perfectly fine!! I almost didn't buy due to some incompetent mom probably with an impatient 7 yr old who left a bad review but happy I didn't listen to her!!!!! Installation took about 30 mins for EVERYTHING and Lego Marvel Heroes WILL STOP INSTALLATION about 80% and ask to switch to disc 2 and then ask to switch back to disc 1 once 100%. Pretty much everything is on disc 1! Moral of the story....don't judge a seller by 1 bad review lol
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Zawacki

customer_reviews.title: Super Hero Glory
customer_reviews.text: Its enhanced for XboxOneX, everything downloaded right from the 2 disks. Most of it is on disk one, then eventually it will prompt you to put in disk 2 for a short time, then back to disk 1 and your done. I had no issues with downloading on my XboxOneX.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzz Rokk

customer_reviews.title: How to get it to work
customer_reviews.text: I had to eject and insert a couple of times before it worked but then it downloaded just fine, hopefully this helps anyone who has the same issue, other than that it worked just fine and I love it
customer_reviews.author: eid

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, hours of enjoyment
customer_reviews.text: I thought this game would be a very short, play for a week and put away game, like most of the Lego titles, but I was wrong. There are many levels to play and all of the are really fun (except for the Spider-Man/Spider-Woman level that was exceedingly frustrating). I highly recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Haas

customer_reviews.title: This is not the marvel experience you were hoping for
customer_reviews.text: They give you a lot in this bundle, in terms of games and updates and stuff so I'm appreciative of that. I know that a lot of people like these games, However, I did not have a whole lot of fun playing these games. It just becomes tedious. Like, the missions are so on a rail, in terms of what you have to do to progress, that it ceases being fun. I really wanted this game cause I like marvel/superhero stuff. But this game wasn't it. Just wait for the real avengers game that dropping later on this year.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Does not download
customer_reviews.text: Received this Friday 5/17/19 after waiting about a month from ordering. The game does not want to download. We’ve been patient waiting for almost 12 hours for it to complete download it stopped at 82%. Then it stated to take out the disc as it might me dirty or scratched(mind you it was brand new). We will try again and I will come back with an update.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dunnihoo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product & One day delivery!
customer_reviews.text: The 2 disk set is brand new - very simple to instal and my grandsons are already playing a game.
customer_reviews.author: A L Whisler

customer_reviews.title: Only one disc works
customer_reviews.text: Only one disc works disc one Lego marvel adventures disc one the other two games says something is wrong with the disc jow I played for just one game when o thought I was getting three I will try to return.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently started letting my six year old get into playing xbox with me. She loves the lego games. These are the perfect games for us to play together and I couldn't pass up this price. It did take a long time to install with multiple discs, but after installation I have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Jess

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't load...
customer_reviews.text: Very upset that this arrived for an extremely excited 7 year old and it would not download despite several hours of trying to get this to work. Not the problem of my Xbox One as we also installed another game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing against the seller, it's against the product. If you're all about achievements but have played these games, separately, this one isn't for you. I ordered this game thinking it would be all new achievements (like the Harry Potter collection) and it was just the same games with the same achievements already unlocked from playing previously, just all on the same game disc. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Babka

customer_reviews.title: cant download
customer_reviews.text: there are 3 games and add-ons but only able to load 1 games and some add-ons. 2 games and most add-on were not able to load. tried hard reset but still can't load.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7y/o Son. He was not big on Super Heroes, but he likes the Lego character games. He absolutely loves these 3 games. Easy to install. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Thad Keese

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for your buck! My friends 9 year old loved that there were 3 games in 1 case that he could play! He is extremely happy. It didn’t take long to get here, arrived in one piece, and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know if it's  digital,  all xbox one, does not run off dicks.
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Because I got it for Xbox one..but you should get the digital game..they are totally different. Had to return 4 games. Need digital instead.
customer_reviews.author: sandra C

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the character interaction and multi player mode. Loaded easily. Seems to be running smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Typical poorly programmed LEGO game
customer_reviews.text: The game play is mediocre at best. It seems like it was rushed and the map is poorly done. Too many races.
customer_reviews.author: Higher Standards

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: We have had this video game for only 3 months and the Disc 2 is no longer reading. It was my son’s favorite so he’s very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ritzyritz

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Love these games for my kids. They are clean and fun and make them think about how to solve the puzzles. Even my youngest who is 3 can get in on the action.
customer_reviews.author: Clint & Chari'

customer_reviews.title: My son is enjoying it.
customer_reviews.text: Works out of the box in xBox, it also has an option to download the whole game, so that DVD is not required.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay V

customer_reviews.title: This didn’t get much play time in our home
customer_reviews.text: My son loves marvel but was bored with this game. Maybe it’s best for younger kids??
customer_reviews.author: cruisingal

customer_reviews.title: I don't know
customer_reviews.text: Don't know cause I bought the wrong xbox one it doesn't have a disc drive
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this item, my kids love playing this game over and over. Definitely worth the price .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great value with it being a 3 in 1 game!! My son loves playing this with his dad & got so excited to get his “own” game!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hennegan

customer_reviews.title: Such a good deal
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids love these Lego games. This was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Momvicsam

customer_reviews.title: 3 games in 1
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome to get three games in one for this price
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Tanis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these games. Haven’t had an issue with playing the separate games.
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: Best lego Marvel Option
customer_reviews.text: good. fun. lots of content and many hours of play.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for three games and my kid love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon U

customer_reviews.title: 3 for one! Great deal .
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this and it was such a great deal! 3 for the price of one!
customer_reviews.author: Heather R

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, lots of content. Shipped and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nichole Davis

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: I drop off at Anazon Hub at Skokie. Monday July 27
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Pinero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Love these games. Disc $20 online $60 great deal. A few disk issues in beginning but all is well now.
customer_reviews.author: Mrz Kamice

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work bought used
customer_reviews.text: Does not work in system I think I bought it used

customer_reviews.title: It's a good game but Personal problems
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but had a slight problem. I had to update my Xbox for 3 days but I guess that's my fault over it's pretty good. (I'm pretty sure you have to be online to install it I had to be at least (Xbox 1 S.)
customer_reviews.author: PårådøX

customer_reviews.title: Awesome package deal
customer_reviews.text: The guys loved it. Came with all the perks and add-ons too! Bonus
customer_reviews.author: JKiah

customer_reviews.title: Fun game to play all around
customer_reviews.text: Lego games are the best for long gameplay and for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Donald m king

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I really enjoy playing the game and being able to play all the Marvel Lego games in one is a huge plus.

customer_reviews.title: Addictive Game!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun & cute game! I would recommend to any Marvel fan.
customer_reviews.author: JV-1985

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Hours of interactive entertainment for my 10 year old. He was thrilled to receive it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second disc does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Second disc does not work, tried it in both of my Xbox’s Nd it won’t read. Disc is clean and no scratches on it. Been trying to make it work since may and it’s no good.
customer_reviews.author: Raysaun

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: Not in the best condition. Case was very sticky, as though something had gotten under plastic wrap. Discs are ok though.

customer_reviews.title: Bunk
customer_reviews.text: I put the game in my Xbox and nothing happened. Tried running it several different times and it wouldn’t do anything.

customer_reviews.title: kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: got it 4 my kid works and great with 3 games

customer_reviews.title: Aside from a glitch or two, a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Had a few glitches in the games, but it was still fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disc cams damaged. Unreadable by xbox
customer_reviews.text: Disc number 1 came with a dent in it. Couldn’t be read by xbox. Package even said warehouse inspected. very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Want all 3 games
customer_reviews.text: It said it came with 3 games, but only came with 2?

customer_reviews.title: Interesting game

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages

customer_reviews.title: LEGO marvel superheros
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to play does not take long to beat all 3 games

product_meta.title: Lego Marvel Collection - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox OneThe LEGO Marvel Collection features three action-packed LEGO Marvel games: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes, LEGO Marvel's Avengers, and LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2, plus all season pass content for each game!
feature_bullets: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes Players take control of a huge roster of characters as they unite to stop Loki and a host of other Marvel villains from assembling a super weapon capable of destroying the world
LEGO Marvel's Avengers Jump into the Marvel Cinematic Universe with characters and story lines from some of the critically acclaimed films and more

LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 Join your favorite Super Heroes and Super Villains from different eras and realities as they go head to head with the time traveling Kang the Conqueror in the all new, original adventure

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,017 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
